text: Maria Conceição da Costa Ferreira (born 13 March 1962 in Aveleda) is a retired Portuguese long-distance runner. She won the 1993 IAAF World Half Marathon Championships, and finished sixth in 10,000 metres at the 1993 World Championships. ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |1984 |Olympic Games |Los Angeles, United States |39th |Marathon |2:50:58 |- |rowspan=2|1986 |Goodwill Games |Moscow, Soviet Union |13th |5000 m |15:54.01 |- |European Championships |Stuttgart, West Germany |26th |10,000 m |33:38.23 |- |1988 |Olympic Games |Seoul, South Korea |20th |Marathon |2:34:23 |- |rowspan=2|1990 |Pittsburgh Marathon |Pittsburgh, United States |bgcolor="gold" | 1st |Marathon |2:30:34 |- |European Championships |Split, SFR Yugoslavia |-- |Marathon |DNF |- |1991 |World Championships |Tokyo, Japan |11th |10,000 m |32:29.12 |- |1993 |World Championships |Stuttgart, Germany |6th |10,000 m |31:30.60 |- |1994 |European Championships |Helsinki, Finland |bgcolor="silver" | 2nd |10,000 m |31:32.82 |} ==References== * * Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese female long- distance runners Category:Portuguese female marathon runners Category:Olympic athletes of Portugal Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:European Athletics Championships medalists Category:World Athletics Championships athletes for Portugal Category:World Athletics Half Marathon Championships winners Category:Portuguese female cross country runners
title: Conceição Ferreira
